txt.en:
[placeholder],

Have you heard the legend of the Ectheldur? It is known among the Dúnedain, but alas, it too has found the attention of tomb-robbers and thieves out of the South who seek to pillage the legacy of Annúminas. If you wish to earn the favour of the Dúnedain or merely take an interest in the preservation of artifacts, come and meet with me at Tinnudir on the shores of Lake Evendim.

Tarneth

'Ah, you must be [placeholder]! I take it you received my letter?'

You hand Tarneth the letter she sent you, and she glances at it before quickly pocketing it.

'Very good! I am Tarneth, Ranger and once-Mariner of the North. As I mentioned in my letter, lost artifacts of Annúminas are under threat by thieves and robbers out of the South. Now that you have come, let us work together to stop them!'
You received a letter from Tarneth, a Ranger of the North who dwells in Tinnudir in Evendim.
Bring the letter to Tarneth in Tinnudir
Tarneth sent you a letter requesting that you visit her in Tinnudir.\n\nDeliver the letter to Tarneth. She can be found in Tinnudir on the shores of Lake Evendim.
